class AIToolbox.Social.TwitterAPIConsumer.PrintOutputListener(api=None)¶

Bases: tweepy.streaming.StreamListener

on_data(raw_data)¶
Args:
raw_data:

Returns:

on_disconnect(notice)¶

Called when twitter sends a disconnect notice

Disconnect codes are listed here: https://dev.twitter.com/docs/streaming-apis/messages#Disconnect_messages_disconnect

on_error(status_code)¶

Called when a non-200 status code is returned

on_limit(track)¶

Called when a limitation notice arrives

on_timeout()¶

Called when stream connection times out
